operate(src_img, dst_img)¶

validate_homography(M)¶
validate_warp(dst_img, x_off, y_off, x_size, y_size)¶

The viable range in the destination image frame is (0, dst_img.shape[1]) in the x-direction, and (0, dst_img.shape[0]) in the y direction.

static warp(src_img, dst_img, M)¶
static warp_bounds(src_img, M)¶

Warp the bounds of the source image to get the bounds of the warped image in the frame of the destination image.
